name: Lange Research Aircraft GmbH
goal: We develop a new solution for a sustainable aerial surveillance operation. Antares E2 is designed and dedicated for silent and emission-free missions over sea. Our aim is to operate things with and not against the natural resources and the game changing low operation cost of this may enable missions against illegal fishing, oil spill, and pollution at all – which have not been flown before due to the high operation cost of legacy systems.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Borders and Security, Climate Action, Environment, Foreign affairs and security policy, Fraud prevention, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Transport
